*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to Emily M. Perry, October 25, 1828. Business relations with Anthony Butler. Religious belief. Cotton market depressed.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*San Felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="10-25-1828">Oct. 25. 1828*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dr *person_mentioned*Sister*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*I rec.d your kind and affectionate letter the other day and sent it down to *person_mentioned*Brother*/person_mentioned*—he came up a few days since with his *person_mentioned*wife */person_mentioned*and is now here—he informs me that he wrote you by way of *location_mentioned*Orleans*/location_mentioned* just before he left *location_mentioned*home*/location_mentioned*—*/p*
*p*I truly sympathise with you on the loss of your *person_mentioned*infant*/person_mentioned*—tho I have seen so much trouble and misery amongst my fellow beings that I doubt wheither we should too deeply grieve for the departure of innocence and purity from this wretched world— There is another and a better one, to doubt it would be to convert the shadows which surround us in this life into the most horrible darkness*/p*
*p*I send this by *person_mentioned*Mr Brown*/person_mentioned* of *location_mentioned*St Charles*/location_mentioned* and he has only a few moments to wait being now on his way therefore cannot write you a long letter. I wish you to inform me what plan you have adopted or think of adopting as to *person_mentioned*Joel */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Austin*/person_mentioned*—*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Brother */person_mentioned*is about engaging in the Mercantile business and I think will soon be enabled to do an extensive and profitable one—*/p*
*p*I am as yet at work at colonization and shall necessarily be tied down here for some time to come—it is a troublesome business and re- quires much more preserverance and patience than any one can imagine who has not tried it— But I will go through with it—*/p*
*p*You ask me how I like my *person_mentioned*sister in law*/person_mentioned*— I am very well pleased with her, and think *person_mentioned*Brown */person_mentioned*has made a happy choice— they live very happily together and have the prospect of an heir this winter or *date_mentioned n="Spring - 1829">early in the spring*/date_mentioned*, tho I presume he has written you relative to his family matters—*/p*
*p*I wrote you to send me the *location_mentioned*old Lead book*/location_mentioned* kept by *person_mentioned*Ballard */person_mentioned*during the year I worked the *location_mentioned*mines */location_mentioned*in partnership with *person_mentioned*Butler*/person_mentioned*. *person_mentioned*M.r Ballard */person_mentioned*knows that nothing was cleared that year. I sent a statement of the a/cs. to *person_mentioned*Butler*/person_mentioned*, but he pretends to claim (as I am informed) Many thousand Dollars I know not exactly what kind of a man *person_mentioned*Ballard*/person_mentioned* is but have always thought him an honest man and I do not think he will forward *person_mentioned*Butler*/person_mentioned*s unjust claims to injure me— I wish *person_mentioned*Mr Perry*/person_mentioned* to sound him as he may deem prudent on the subject— The truth is that the *location_mentioned*mines */location_mentioned*cleared nothing the year *person_mentioned*Butler */person_mentioned*and myself worked them in *person_mentioned*partnership */person_mentioned*and I therefore owe him nothing on that score*/p*
*p*This *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*has been very healthy this *date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1828">year */date_mentioned*and we are getting on pritty well in every respect— I will pay you a visit some time but cannot tell when, it shall be as soon as possible— I know you cannot visit me and I do not wish you to take such a journey— It is too long, and exposed to some dangers— Remember me affectionately to *person_mentioned*Mr Perry*/person_mentioned* and all old *person_mentioned*friends */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*acquaintances*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S. F. Austin */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p* *p*[Address:] *person_mentioned*Mrs Emily M. Perry */person_mentioned* *location_mentioned* Potosi Missouri */location_mentioned* *person_mentioned*Mr J Brown*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
